snippet: Fighters in Surt pounded loyalists holed up in two neighborhoods with rocket and machine-gun fire Friday, but also suffered heavy casualties themselves. Wounded men streamed into frontline medical units and then were evacuated to field hospitals on...

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Fighters in Surt pounded loyalists holed up in two neighborhoods with rocket and machine-gun fire Friday, but also suffered heavy casualties themselves. Wounded men streamed into frontline medical units and then were evacuated to field hospitals on the city’s outskirts.
